name: StatinAllergen
title: Statin Allergen
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent an allergy to statin medications.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Allergy/Intolerance.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with statins and statin allergens. This is a grouping value set of RXNORM and SNOMED codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)

concept.display: Substance with 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme A reductase inhibitor mechanism of action (substance)
